contentrichtext.text: '''Goudi Olympic Complex''' is a sports complex in [[Athens]], [[Greece]]. It held two of the sports venues used during the [[2004 Summer Olympics]]. == Goudi Olympic Hall == {{Main|Goudi Olympic Hall}} == Olympic Modern Pentathlon Centre == {{Main|Olympic Modern Pentathlon Centre}} == Post-Olympics Development == The Goudi Olympic Complex is now the site of the ultra-modern [[Badminton Theater]], hosting major theatrical productions (e.g. ''[[West Side Story (musical)|West Side Story]]'', ''[[Romeo and Juliet]]'')<ref>http://www.badmintontheater.gr/</ref><ref>http://www.olympicproperties.gr/contents_gr.asp?id=11</ref> ==References== {{Reflist|1}} *[http://www.la84foundation.org/6oic/OfficialReports/2004/or2004b.pdf 2004 Summer Olympics official report.] Volume 2. pp. 265, 367. {{2004 Summer Olympic venues}} {{coord|37.983826|23.780349|type:landmark|display=title}} [[Category:Badminton venues]] [[Category:2004 Summer Olympic venues]] [[Category:Sports venues in Greece]] {{2004-Olympic-stub}} {{Greece-sports-venue-stub}}
